title: Encroachment
description: "Everybody wants to rule the world." To Manuel, no truer words have been spoken. As the feisty member of The Elders, Manuel is often chided for his hot temper and diplomatic incompetence. To prove his aptitude to his colleagues, Manuel executes a new type of social warfare to fulfill his wildest dreams, but will his reckless actions derail his chances at achieving his ultimate goal?
author: Lynn  Daniels
